channel.title: CSO and NGO side session at TAG: good idea?
channel.description: Hello, we're thinking about having a side event at the TAG, probably on Saturday morning, for CSOs, NGOs and NGO platforms involved in IATI so that we can meet each other and have a chat before the TAG and Steering Committee meetings kick off. If you think this is a good idea, please let us know by replying to this thread. Thanks! Sarah (on behalf of the CSO Working Group).

item.title: CSO and NGO side session at TAG: good idea?
item.dc:creator: Claudia_Schwegmann
item.description:
Yes, Sarah! Thanks for suggesting that!!! I had already searched the agenda for the CSO IATI group event

Read full topic
item.source: CSO and NGO side session at TAG: good idea?
